N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 431.15 - Information to families

State Regulations

While the assessment is being prepared pursuant to Part
428 of this Title, for those children for whom a uniform case record is
required to be maintained pursuant to Part 428, each family of such children
shall be provided by the local social services district with: (a) a full explanation of foster care
services and preventive services, including the respective obligations of
parents and agencies as well as the rights of parents and children to religious
protections as provided in section
373
of the

Social Services Law; (b) information about other child welfare services or assistance which may be
alternative to placement; (c) assistance in applying for services for which they are eligible, and
ascertaining whether those services are being provided; (d) counseling; and
(e) referral for and help in obtaining
assistance and services from other agencies and other units within the local
district. Notes
